name: Clockwork Beetle
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The clockwork beetle is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The clockwork beetle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage, or one-half poison damage with a successful DC 10 Constitution saving throw.
